edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prg.bc

Class BcPRG

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prg.bc.BcPRG
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PseudorandomGenerator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BcRC4

    public abstract class BcPRG
extends java.lang.Object
implements PseudorandomGenerator
    A general adapter class of PRG for bouncy castle.

    This class implements the PRG functionality by passing requests to the adaptee interface StreamCipher. A concrete prg such as RC4 represented in the class BcRC4 only passes the RC4Engine object in the constructor.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Meital Levy)
